alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 10 at 4:28AM PST until March 10 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
